resources.string: No downloads yet.\nTap the \'Download\' button to add items to the download queue.
This demo shows how the pause and resume of a download works. Tap on a download that\'s in progress to pause it and tap on a paused item to resume it.
This demo shows how the deletion of a download works. Use the \'Delete\' buttons to delete downloads that are in any state.
This demo shows how you can create a batch to download many files as one download (the list shows them separately to show a batch contains more than one item).
